title: How Supabase Is Building Its Platform Engineering Strategy
author: Todd R Weiss
description: Supabase shares its platform engineering experiences and insights as it further refines and builds out its open source PostgreSQL database infrastructure application that competes with Google’s Firebase.
cntitle: Supabase 如何构建其平台工程策略
cndescription: Supabase 分享其平台工程经验和见解，因为它进一步完善和构建其开源 PostgreSQL 数据库基础设施应用程序，该应用程序与 Google 的 Firebase 竞争。
